Positive Octyl Sodium Sulfate

Alias

SOS, Sipexols, Cyclorylos

Name

Sodium octyl sulfate

CAS No.

142-31-4

Molecular Formula

C8H17NaO4S

Molecular Weight

232.27

Inspection ItemResult
AppearanceClear,Colorless to yellowish liquid
Active Substance, %35-40
Unsulfated Substance, %≤1.0
Sodium sulfate, %≤1.0
Sodium chloride, %≤0.5
PH-value (5% aq sol, 25℃)7.5-11.0
Color (Hazen)≺200
